Summary: Observed a very bright light in SE sky that I thought was a star until I realized it was moving quite fast in an apparent NW direction.Height unknnown.After approx. 2 minutes the object seemed to dim and then suddenly disappeared.
trends: There has been one other sighting in DeWitt Charter Township
There was one other sighting in DeWitt Charter Township on or around February 8th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsLeaving home for a short trip to the store at about 7:45 pm I looked up at the sky-as is normal for me since I enjoy looking at the stars.There were no clouds visible and my attention was immediately drawn to a very bright object in the South East sky which at first I mistook as a star.I immediately realized the object was moving on a straight line in an apparent North Westerly direction ande never appeared to change course. The object was very bright and never blinked or wavered in intensity.After approximately a couple minutes the object appeared to dim and then suddenly disappeared completely.I continued to observe the sky for several minutes afterward and the object never reappeared.
